commands.name: az containerapp ingress traffic set
commands.summary: Configure traffic-splitting for a container app.
examples: az containerapp ingress traffic set -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --revision-weight latest=100
az containerapp ingress traffic set -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --revision-weight latest=80 MyRevisionName=20
az containerapp ingress traffic set -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --label-weight myLabel=80 myLabel2=20
az containerapp ingress traffic set -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --revision-weight latest=80 --label-weight myLabel=20

commands.name: az containerapp ingress traffic show
commands.summary: Show traffic-splitting configuration for a container app.
examples: az containerapp ingress traffic show -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup
